original_title: スーパーロボット魂2000　夏の陣
overview: Recorded at Shibuya ON AIR EAST on August 13, 2000, Super Robot Spirits brings the original artists together to celebrate the robot series theme songs.. In addition, the "SUPER ROBOT SPIRITS HISTORY" summarizes the history of super robot soul live
title: Super Robot Spirits 2000 -Summer Team-
